boost::constrained_value::clip

Error policy for constrained that clips the new value to the bounds. More...

Detailed Description

Error policy for constrained that clips the new value to the bounds.

Definition at line 34 of file clipping.hpp.

Member Function Documentation

void operator() ( V &  ov,
const V &  nv,
const within_bounds< L, U, boost::mpl::false_, boost::mpl::false_, C > &  c 
) const

The policy invocation operator.

If nv is below the range, assigns c.lower_bound() to ov. If nv is above the range, assigns c.upper_bound() to ov.

Remarks:
  • V must be Assignable from L and U.
  • c must represent a valid range (the upper bound cannot be less than the lower bound with regard to the comparison predicate).
